titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to reauthorize the National Oceanographic Partnership Program, and for other purposes.
National Oceanographic Partnership Program Reauthorization Act
National Oceanographic Partnership Program Reauthorization Act
National Oceanographic Partnership Program Reauthorization Act

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment.

Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committees on Armed Services, and Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
